entry.title: Incident with Codespaces
entry.content:
Jan 1, 18:28 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 1, 17:28 UTC
Update - We have identified the issue and are deploying a fix. We will update our status when the fix is fully deployed.

Jan 1, 16:44 UTC
Update - Codespaces is experiencing issues with web connectivity from GitHub.com. The desktop client can still be used to launch or connect to codespaces."

Jan 1, 16:33 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Codespaces.

entry.content:

Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Update - We are continuing mitigation for an issue impacting some Codespaces customers. We will keep you updated on progress.

Update - We are continuing to work on mitigation for an issue impacting some Codespaces customers. We will continue to keep you updated on progress.

Dec 31, 00:39 UTC
Update - We identified an issue that impacts some Codespaces customers and are working on mitigation.We will continue to keep you updated on progress.

Dec 31, 00:07 UTC

entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.content:
Dec 20, 07:58 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 20, 07:23 UTC
Update - We are seeing delayed workflow job status updates for Actions. We are seeing the status update events being backed up and have applied a mitigation. We continue to monitor the delay.

Dec 20, 06:55 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.

entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.content:
Dec 20, 01:38 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 20, 01:02 UTC
Update - We have identified the issue with manual workflow invocations from the UI. A mitigation will be deployed shortly.

Dec 20, 00:09 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.

entry.title: Incident with Codespaces
entry.content:
Dec 6, 20:58 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 6, 20:34 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate issues affecting some Codespaces customers in the westus2 region.

Dec 6, 19:51 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate issues affecting some Codespaces customers.

Dec 6, 19:15 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate issues affecting customers connecting to and starting Codespaces.

Dec 6, 18:41 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate issues affecting customers connecting to and starting Codespaces.

Dec 6, 18:06 UTC
Update - We are investigating issues preventing customers from starting and connecting to existing Codespaces. Creating a new Codespaces is one possible workaround for those affected.

Dec 6, 17:53 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Codespaces.

entry.title: Incident with Git Operations and Pull Requests
entry.content:
Dec 5, 18:40 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 5, 18:07 UTC
Update - We have identified possible causes slowing down git operations including push and pull for a small number of customers, as well as some slow merge operations and are working on mitigating now.

Dec 5, 17:31 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Git Operations and Pull Requests.

entry.title: Investigating reports of degraded performance.
entry.content:
Nov 30, 17:13 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 30, 17:12 UTC
Update - The issue affecting the new code view beta has been resolved.

Nov 30, 16:21 UTC
Update - We have diagnosed that the ongoing issue related to code search and code view is limited to customers in the current beta for those features. A mitigation has been identified and is in progress.

Nov 30, 16:03 UTC
Update - We are investigating reports of issues with service(s): GitHub Search and the new Code View. We will continue to keep users updated on progress towards mitigation.

Nov 30, 16:02 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

entry.title: Incident with Copilot
entry.content:
Nov 26, 01:41 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 26, 01:18 UTC
Update - We found an issue that impacts small subset of customers. We are working on mitigation.

Nov 26, 00:46 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Copilot.

entry.title: Incident with Packages and Pages
entry.content:
Nov 25, 16:34 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 25, 16:13 UTC
Update - GitHub Packages has almost fully recovered. Continuing to restore remaining traffic and ensure service remains healthy before returning to green.

Nov 25, 15:50 UTC
Update - Packages is now experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

Nov 25, 15:45 UTC
Update - Following mitigations being put in place, we are seeing recovery for GitHub Packages, GitHub Pages and ghcr.io. We are monitoring this recovery and will continue to update.

Nov 25, 15:40 UTC
Update - Pages is operating normally.

Nov 25, 15:11 UTC
Update - We are investigating issues with Packages. GitHub Pages and ghcr.io are also impacted. We will continue to update users as we progress towards mitigation.

Nov 25, 15:06 UTC
Update - Packages is now experiencing degraded availability. We are continuing to investigate.

Nov 25, 14:39 UTC
Update - Pages is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Nov 25, 14:39 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Packages.

entry.title: Incident with Copilot
entry.content:
Nov 25, 06:24 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 25, 05:48 UTC
Update - We found an issue that is causing some Copilot users to incorrectly receive a response indicating their subscription has ended. We are continuing to work on mitigation.

Nov 25, 05:16 UTC
Update - We found an issue that is causing some Copilot users to incorrectly receive a response indicating their subscription has ended. We are working on mitigation.

Nov 25, 04:13 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Copilot.
